General.Name: Solar Gold Ltd
General.Description: Solar Gold Ltd. operates in the oil and gas sector. The company was formerly known as Planktos Merger Co. and changed its name to Solar Gold Ltd. in June 2014. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in San Juan Capistrano, California. The company operates as a subsidiary of Maidon Services Limited.
General.Address: 31878 Del Obispo, San Juan Capistrano, CA, United States, 92675
